casebody.data:
James ANDERSON, Appellant,
v.
CITY OF ST. PETE BEACH, a municipal government of the State of Florida; Beverly Garnett; Jim Parent ; Al Halpern; Marvin Shavlan; sued in their official capacity as Commissioners of the City of St. Pete Beach; and Michael Finnerty, sued in his official capacity as Mayor of the City of St. Pete Beach, Appellees. Case No. 2D16-5346 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District. Opinion filed September 29, 2017

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed.
